mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_ID, NAME, ADDRESS, LAT, LNG, IMG_PATH, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM PLACE

SELECT p.ID, p.NAME, p.ADDRESS, p.LAT, p.LNG, p.DESCRIPTION, p.IMG_PATH, p.CREATED_DATE, p.MODIFIED_DATE, p.USER_ID, (SELECT nickname FROM USER u WHERE p.USER_ID = u.ID) AS NICKNAME, (SELECT count(*) FROM PLACE_LIKE pl WHERE pl.PLACE_ID = p.ID) AS `LIKE`, (SELECT count(*) FROM PLACE_LIKE pl WHERE pl.PLACE_ID = #{placeId} and pl.USER_ID = #{userId}) as `IS_LIKE` FROM PLACE p WHERE p.ID = #{placeId}

SELECT ID, USER_ID, NAME, ADDRESS, LAT, LNG, DESCRIPTION
FROM PLACE WHERE (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') AND NAME NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', '삭제된 장소', '%')) OR (ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') AND NAME NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', '삭제된 장소', '%'))
SELECT ID, IMG_PATH FROM PLACE WHERE ID=#{placeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACE (USER_ID, NAME, ADDRESS, LAT, LNG, DESCRIPTION, IMG_PATH, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES (#{param.userId}, #{param.name}, #{param.address}, #{param.lat}, #{param.lng}, #{param.description}, #{param.imgPath}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE PLACE SET NAME=#{param.name}, ADDRESS=#{param.address}, LAT=#{param.lat}, LNG=#{param.lng}, DESCRIPTION=#{param.description}, IMG_PATH=#{param.imgPath}, MODIFIED_DATE=NOW() WHERE ID=#{param.id}
